urgent.action: Implement 301 redirect from http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en to https://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en - HTTP version getting 115 impressions with 0.9% CTR vs HTTPS homepage 19.7% CTR
urgent.reasoning: Duplicate content issue splitting ranking signals. HTTP page has 22x more impressions than HTTPS equivalent but terrible CTR. Fix redirects to consolidate authority.

urgent.action: Optimize Google Business Profile immediately - verify listing, add Waikiki/Honolulu location keywords to website, add structured data for LocalBusiness schema
urgent.reasoning: 28 impressions for 'donuts near me' with 0 clicks at position 8.8. With opening in 9 days, local SEO is critical. Position 8.8 means you're often below the fold.

urgent.action: Rewrite meta descriptions to include compelling CTAs mentioning 'Opening Feb 25' and location 'Waikiki' - current pages not converting impressions to clicks
urgent.reasoning: Multiple keywords ranking positions 2-10 with 0% CTR indicates searchers see your listing but don't click. Meta descriptions likely not compelling enough.

quickWins.action: Add 'Kona Coffee Donuts' (plural) to H1 or title tag on homepage - currently ranking position 9 vs position 1 for singular
quickWins.reasoning: Singular version ranks #1 with 40% CTR. Plural variant at position 9 with only 20% CTR. Simple text change could push plural to top 3.

quickWins.action: Add 'doughnuts' spelling variant to page content naturally - currently position 3 with 0 clicks from 3 impressions
quickWins.reasoning: Position 3 is prime real estate. Adding 'doughnuts' spelling can help secure this ranking and improve CTR with opening date in meta.

quickWins.action: Ensure 'donut shop' phrase appears in homepage H2 or content with Waikiki/Honolulu context
quickWins.reasoning: Already position 2 - one spot away from top. Small content optimization could secure #1 for high-intent local query.

quickWins.action: Expand Korean about-kona-coffee page content - currently position 4 with 33% CTR, outperforming English equivalent
quickWins.reasoning: Korean page has 4.2% CTR vs English 2.4% CTR. Korean tourists are high-value segment. More Korean content could capture this market.

opportunities.action: Create dedicated landing page for 'Hawaiian coffee and donuts' - currently position 20.4 with 5 impressions. Content targeting 'authentic Hawaiian coffee Waikiki' and 'best donuts in Hawaii'
opportunities.reasoning: This is your unique positioning. No direct competitors can claim authentic Kona coffee + fresh donuts. Building topical authority here differentiates from generic donut shops.

opportunities.action: Create Japanese language pages (/ja/) - Japan is second largest traffic source (3 clicks) with no optimized Japanese content
opportunities.reasoning: Japanese tourists are major Waikiki demographic. Japanese pages could capture significant tourist search traffic.

opportunities.action: Optimize /en/menu page - 31 impressions, 0 clicks at position 13. Add rich snippets, improve meta description, internal linking
opportunities.reasoning: Menu page getting impressions but no clicks. Better optimization could convert searchers looking for specific menu items.

insights.observation: Brand keyword 'kona coffee donut' ranks #1 with 40% CTR - strong brand recognition
insights.suggestion: Continue building brand awareness through social media and local PR before grand opening

insights.observation: Japan (3 clicks) and Korea (1 click) generating international traffic. Korean page CTR (4.2%) outperforms English (2.4%)
insights.suggestion: Prioritize multilingual content - tourists are a key customer segment for Waikiki location

insights.observation: Mobile accounts for 27.6% of traffic with higher engagement than desktop. Most local searches are mobile.
insights.suggestion: Ensure mobile experience is flawless - fast load times, click-to-call, easy navigation

insights.observation: 9 days until grand opening (Feb 25). Current 657 impressions/week shows growing awareness.
insights.suggestion: Push countdown content, update meta descriptions with opening date, prepare for local search surge

summary.topPriority: Fix HTTP/HTTPS redirect and optimize meta descriptions for local 'near me' keywords before Feb 25 opening
